code: import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{useAnimation}from"framer-motion";import events from"../events";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var HomeNavbarDown=["About","Contact us","Login","Signup","Forget password","Dashboard"];var Paths=["/aboute","/contactus","/login","/signin","/forget-password","/dashboard"];var NavbarOtherPages=function NavbarOtherPages(_ref){var controller=_ref.controller;var controllers={0:useAnimation(),1:useAnimation(),2:useAnimation(),3:useAnimation(),4:useAnimation(),5:useAnimation()};var location=useLocation().pathname;var isHere=function isHere(e){e=Paths[e];if(e===location)return true;else return false;};Paths.forEach(function(e,i){if(e===location)controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().sColor});else controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().wColor});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"dropDown",animate:controller,whileHover:{opacity:1},children:HomeNavbarDown.map(function(e,i){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:Paths[i],className:"dropDownItem",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{className:"span",onHoverStart:function onHoverStart(){if(!isHere(i)){controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().sColor});}},onHoverEnd:function onHoverEnd(){if(!isHere(i)){controllers[i].start({color:events.theme().wColor});}},animate:controllers[i],transition:{duration:0.2},children:e})},i);})});};export default NavbarOtherPages;
